text: The 2001–02 international cricket season was from September 2001 to April 2002. This season featured 43 Test matches, 88 One-day Internationals, 5 first class matches, 5 List A matches, 2 Women's Test matches and 20 Women's One Day Internationals. ==Season overview== {| class="wikitable" !
